attacks.name: Cell Connector
attacks.effect: Attach 2 Fighting Energy cards from your discard pile to this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Verdict-GX
attacks.effect: Prevent all damage done to this Pokémon by attacks from Pokémon-GX and Pokémon-EX during your opponent's next turn. (You can't use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)
